name: CPContact
desc: A data object that contains information about a contact.

items.name: init(name: String, image: UIImage)
items.desc: Creates a contact with a name and an image.

items.name: var subtitle: String?
items.desc: A subtitle that the template displays in addition to the contact’s name.

items.name: var informativeText: String?
items.desc: Additional text that the template displays.

items.name: var actions: [CPButton]?
items.desc: The actions that the template displays for this contact.

items.name: class CPContactCallButton
items.desc: A button for calling the contact.

items.name: class CPContactDirectionsButton
items.desc: A button for getting directions to the contact’s location.

items.name: class CPContactMessageButton
items.desc: A button that activates Siri and initiates the compose message flow.
